remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的控件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]支持丰富的内容、 样式、 触发器和模板。Controls in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] support rich content, styles, triggers, and templates. 在许多情况下，这些功能，可以创建自定义和一致的体验，而无需创建一个新的控件。In many cases, these features allow you to create custom and consistent experiences without having to create a new control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式设置和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 如果需要创建一个新的控件，最简单方法是创建一个类，派生自。If you do need to create a new control, the simplest way is to create a class that derives from . 这样做之前，请考虑您的控件不支持模板，因此将不支持复杂的自定义项。Before you do so, consider that your control will not support templates and therefore will not support complex customization. 但是，派生自是合适的模式，如果你想要通过将现有元素添加到其中，类似于如何生成应用程序，生成你的控件，并且不需要支持复杂的自定义。However, deriving from is a suitable model if you want to build your control by adding existing elements to it, similar to how you build an application, and if you do not need to support complex customization. (如果你想要将模板与控件一起使用，派生自相反。)有关用于创建控件的不同模型的详细信息，请参阅[控件创作概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md)。(If you want to use templates with your control, derive from instead.) For more information about the different models for authoring controls, see [Control Authoring Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md). A是，这意味着，它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 一个映像或一个面板） 的单个对象。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个简单`NumericUpDown` 。The following example shows how to create a simple `NumericUpDown`.
